sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Closing Request with Closed Incomplete as it is rejected by manager.

sys_element_mapping.value: state=4^work_notes=Request Number {{c690f837-82e7-44d4-b4cb-1822bdc2529c.record.number}}rejected by Manager. Now state is Closed Incomplete.

Hi,Flow Variables➛...➛First name Flow Variables➛...➛Last name

Request Status for Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Number is 15 - Update Record➛...➛State.

Please act accordingly,

Thanks
state=3^work_notes=Request Number {{c690f837-82e7-44d4-b4cb-1822bdc2529c.record.number}}approved by Badging Officer. Now State is Closed Complete.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Assign Request to manager of requested for user.
Approval from manager of requested user.
Creating record in Alert Request Status with updated details from API.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger - Record Created➛...➛First name Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Last name,

Your request for New Badge has been rejected.

  • Requested ID : Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Number.
  • Requested By : Trigger - Record Created➛...➛First name Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Last name
  • Reason : 

Thanks

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Creating audit log with updated details.

sys_element_mapping.value: state=4^work_notes=Request Number{{c690f837-82e7-44d4-b4cb-1822bdc2529c.record.number}}Rejected by Badging Officer. Now State is Closed Incomplete.

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Getting information on badging officer in SNOW.
Checking the data received for badging officer.
Manager Approved Request for new badge.
